desc.p: This multi-value field shall hold the interest amount returned to the borrower
This multi-value field shall hold the date on which interest amount is returned to the borrower
This is a table to hold the details of the returned interest amount with the return interest date. The CONTRACT.NUMBER is the LD contract I.
This multi-value field shall hold the commission amount returned to the borrowe.
This multi-value field shall hold the date on which commission amount is returned to the borrowe.
This multi-value field shall hold the interest amount returned to the borrowe.
This multi-value field shall hold the date on which interest amount is returned to the borrower
This is a table to hold the details of the returned interest amount with the
return interest date. The CONTRACT.NUMBER is the LD contract ID
This multi-value field shall hold the commission amount returned to the borrower
This multi-value field shall hold the date on which commission amount is returned to the borrower
